entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Joliette
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Assomption 09:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 58 %
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: WNW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
